titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Peters Salt & Lumber Company general merchandise store photograph.

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

did.unittitle: Peters Salt & Lumber Company general merchandise store photograph.

descgrp.accessrestrict: The collection is open for research use.

archdesc.bioghist: Peters Salt & Lumber Company was located in Eastlake, Manistee County, Michigan at the turn of the 20th century.
archdesc.scopecontent: Photograph of the storefront of the Peters Salt & Lumber Company. The sign reads "R.G. Peters Salt and Lumber Co. General Merchandise." The back of the photograph is inscribed "East Lake".
